message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. I'm open to discussing further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price. While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $13,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000.
